item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it." -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Jalal Ad-Din Rumi
item.description:
"Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing there is a field. I'll meet you there.
When the soul lies down in that grass the world is too full to talk about." -- Jalal Ad-Din Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?" -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "The wound is the place where the Light enters you." -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "What you seek is seeking you." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Donâ€™t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form." -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?" -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Dance, when you're broken open. Dance, if you've torn the bandage off. Dance in the middle of the fighting. Dance in your blood. Dance when you're perfectly free." -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Sell your cleverness and buy bewilderment." -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy." -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "When I am with you, we stay up all night. When you're not here, I can't go to sleep. Praise God for those two insomnias! And the difference between them." -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Jalal Ad-Din Rumi
item.description: "Knock, And He'll open the door Vanish, And He'll make you shine like the sun Fall, And He'll raise you to the heavens Become nothing, And He'll turn you into everything." -- Jalal Ad-Din Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Forget safety. Live where you fear to live. Destroy your reputation. Be notorious." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi Jalalud-Din
item.description: "Ignore those that make you fearful and sad, that degrade you back towards disease and death." -- Rumi Jalalud-Din

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "And still, after all this time, the Sun has never said to the Earth, "You owe me." Look what happens with love like that. It lights up the sky." -- Hafiz

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "My soul is from elsewhere, I'm sure of that, and I intend to end up there." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description:
"I want to see you.
Know your voice.
Recognize you when you first come 'round the corner.
Sense your scent when I come into a room you've just left.
Know the lift of your heel, the glide of your foot.
Become familiar with the way you purse your lips then let them part, just the slightest bit, when I lean in to your space and kiss you.
I want to know the joy of how you whisper "more" -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Don't be satisfied with stories, how things have gone with others. Unfold your own myth." -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "silence is the language of god, all else is poor translation." -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "There is a candle in your heart, ready to be kindled. There is a void in your soul, ready to be filled. You feel it, don't you?" -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "I want to sing like the birds sing, not worrying about who hears or what they think." -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Let the beauty we love be what we do. There are hundreds of ways to kneel and kiss the ground." -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Let yourself be drawn by the stronger pull of that which you truly love." -- Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Be grateful for whoever comes, because each has been sent as a guide from beyond." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Ahren add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Words are a pretext. It is the inner bond that draws one person to another, not words." -- Rumi
